scripts.build:rust: cd rust && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/numpy_bench.wasm ../dist/
scripts.build:rust-threads: cd rust && RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals' cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -Z build-std=std,panic_abort && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/numpy_bench.wasm ../dist/numpy_bench_threads.wasm
scripts.build:zig: cd zig && zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseFast && cp zig-out/lib/numpy_bench.wasm ../dist/
scripts.build:zig-threads: cd zig && zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseFast -Dthreads=true && cp zig-out/lib/numpy_bench_threads.wasm ../dist/
scripts.build:all: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:rust && npm run build:zig
